title: Not getting notifications from some apps
content: I am not getting notifications through on the growlr or recon app. I have cleared the cache and app data. Turned notifications on and off changed the battery settings to allow the app to run in the back ground turned adaptive battery on and off. Deleted the app and restarted my phone. I have only had this issue since switching to the pixel 5 from the note 10+5G. Any suggestions?
